name: World
description: Explores global events and trends throughout history.

name: Americas
description: Delves into the rich history of North, Central, and South America.

name: Asia
description: Focuses on the diverse cultures and historical developments in Asia.

name: Military
description: Examines wars, conflicts, military strategy, and their impact on history.

name: Europe
description: Covers the complex history of the European continent.

name: Russia
description: Specifically studies the history of Russia, its empires, and its role in the world.

name: Africa
description: Explores the vast and diverse histories of African nations and cultures.

name: Ancient Civilizations
description: Investigates the origins, rise, and fall of early civilizations.

name: Middle East
description: Examines the history of the Middle East, including its cultures and pivotal events.

name: Historical Study & Educational Resources
description: Provides tools, guides, and resources for the study of history.

name: Australia & Oceania
description: Focuses on the history of Australia, New Zealand, and Pacific Island nations.

name: Arctic & Antarctica
description: Explores the history and significance of the polar regions.
